description: This salad is fast becoming a modern classic. The sweetness of the ripe melon contrasts wonderfully with the salty feta and the nuttiness of the pumpkin seeds.
name: Watermelon Salad With Feta & Pumpkin Seeds Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g watermelon, peeled, deseeded if preferred, and cut into 2cm squares

recipeInstructions.text: Dryfry the pumpkin seeds for 2-3 minutes until they start to pop. Add a pinch of sea salt and the chilli powder, stir, and cook for another minute. Set aside to cool.
In a large bowl, whisk together the oil, lemon juice, and sea salt and pepper to taste. Add the watermelon, red onion, and salad leaves, and toss well to coat with the dressing.
Scatter the feta cheese and the seeds over the top of the salad and serve immediately.
